game.name: Herb Tea Man
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In a world moving too fast, your little tea shop is a quiet corner where people can slow down, sip something warm (or bitter!), and maybe heal a bit — body and soul.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In a world moving too fast, your little tea shop is a quiet corner where people can slow down, sip something warm (or bitter!), and maybe heal a bit — body and soul.
